help me write a cold message to express interest 🚨 Exciting update from the Buildbook team!

We’ve just closed an additional round of funding from some incredible angel investors here in the Bay 

What does this mean?

✅ We’re increasing intern pay for the summer internship cohort
✅ We’re expanding the team with more intern roles (Design, Software, Marketing, etc.) 

That’s why we’re extending our interview timeline to July 10th. If you haven’t applied yet and want to be part of what we’re building, like and comment, then shoot me a DM — happy to share how to get involved!
